Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum time it takes for SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation to occur after SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average duration of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation until the next activity (SW-Awaiting EIC Decision)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time spent in SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation compared to the time spent in SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation and the end of the case

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include both activities
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation after the last SW-Reviewer Agreed event in each case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases where multiple reviewers agreed (i.e., multiple SW-Reviewer Agreed events precede it)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum time between the final SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in complex reviewer assignment variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Time of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in variants that involve reviewer reminders (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2) versus variants without reminders
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and the end of case where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurs

Name: Average time it takes SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation to be performed after all required reviewers have agreed (i.e., after the last SW-Reviewer Agreed in a case)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Total time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases that eventually lead to SW-EIC Major Revision versus SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Cycle Time of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation measured from the moment the first reviewer agrees (first SW-Reviewer Agreed) to the start of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Time between SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation and the preceding SW-Reviewer Agreed in the longest variant path involving repeated reviewer assignments and declines
Metric: The maximum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'
